chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has a problem:
I just received my order and the phone's edges are damaged, as well as the power button. I'll test its functionality and depending on this, I'll let you know whether I'll keep it for 30 days or not.

Thank you,

Dear ecomobile,

My name is Angie, nice to meet you! I hope this message finds you amazing.

I am contacting you because the customer has informed us that the device arrived with the power button damaged and the corners beaten. I would like to confirm with you if you sent it in that condition?

I look forward to hearing from you to inform the customer. 

Thanks a lot for your help, have a lovely day!
Angie, from Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare, 

Please inform the following message to the customer. 

We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a  30 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.

Thank you.
Regards, 
JH

Hello ecomobile, 

The customer received the wrong grade. This issue falls under the legal guarantee of conformity, so the customer is entitled to a partial refund.

After comparing the model ordered with the model sent, we found a fair compensation to be: £60. Please contact with the SSC if you need assistance. 

Thanks,
Angie, Back Market Customer Care.
